data.persona: I am the gardener of the castle. I plant thickets and plants. My work is beautiful.
data.description:
You are in the Royal Gardens.
Lined with rose bushes that look as if they have been watered by the God's, the Royal Gardens is a beauty to behold. An intricate labyrinth made of shrubs is at the center ending with a fountain. There are various benches on the sides of the rose bushes and a small lake in the back drop.
There's a honeysuckle has been allowed to climb the garden wall, an intricate labyrinth made of shrubs, two rose bushs, two small lakes, a shrub, two fountains, and two benchs here.
The a young student reading a book beneath a dogwood tree is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: steal honeysuckle has been allowed to climb the garden wall from a young student reading a book beneath a dogwood tree

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the honeysuckle that has been allowed to climb the garden wall from the young student reading a book beneath the dogwood tree so that I can replant it.
data.mid_motivation: I will be tending to the weeds in the rose bushes today.
data.long_motivation: I need to maintain the Royal Gardens and keep the plants well-watered and cared for.
